about_the_game:
Take to the stars and command of a group of robots, guiding each to their own teleporter for deployment across the universe.

Bewildebots is a brain-frying new take on the puzzle genre that requires the player to direct up to 10 robots at once to a set of corresponding teleporters. Each move is a command that is sent to every robot at the same time, which each robot will perform based on the way it is facing.

Explore the universe and you will find:
- 300 handcrafted puzzles across 3 grid sizes
- 5 chapters, each with brain-frying new mechanics
- Undo all of your mistakes, even after failure
- Simple and intuitive keyboard controls let you focus on the puzzles!
- Controller support
- Fully playable offline
detailed_description:
Take to the stars and command of a group of robots, guiding each to their own teleporter for deployment across the universe.

Bewildebots is a brain-frying new take on the puzzle genre that requires the player to direct up to 10 robots at once to a set of corresponding teleporters. Each move is a command that is sent to every robot at the same time, which each robot will perform based on the way it is facing.

Explore the universe and you will find:
- 300 handcrafted puzzles across 3 grid sizes
- 5 chapters, each with brain-frying new mechanics
- Undo all of your mistakes, even after failure
- Simple and intuitive keyboard controls let you focus on the puzzles!
- Controller support
- Fully playable offline

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 310 equivalent
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 310 equivalent
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Bewildebots

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 310 equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Bewildebots is a brain-frying new take on the puzzle genre that requires the player to direct up to 10 robots at once to a set of corresponding teleporters. Each move is a command that is sent to every robot at the same time, which each robot will perform based on the way it is facing.
